title: (Software) Avira AntiVir Personal - Free Antivirus 8.1.0.367 - D
description:
Software: 
Avira AntiVir Personal - Free Antivirus 8.1.0.367 

Description: 
AntiVir software is a reliable free antivirus solution, that constantly and rapidly scans your computer for malicious programs (such as viruses, Trojans, backdoor programs, hoaxes, worms, dialers etc.), monitoring every action executed by the user or by the operating system and being able to react promptly when a malicious program is detected. It also protects your computer against dangerous viruses, worms, Trojans and costly dialers. 

More Info: 
Avira AntiVir is developed by Avira GmbH. It is compatible with Windows 2K/XP/Vista.
